abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: Innate: Brand's abilities set his targets  ablaze for 4 seconds, dealing 「 3% of their maximum health over 3.25 seconds 」「 1% of their maximum health every 1.083 seconds 」 as magic damage. Abilities used on an ablazed target are empowered and apply other stacks of Blaze while also refreshing the duration of the previous ones. A target can have up to 3 Blaze stacks at the same time. The damage per tick against monsters is increased by 20%, but capped at 80.
descriptions: Innate: Brand's abilities set his targets  ablaze for 4 seconds, dealing 「 3% of their maximum health over 3.25 seconds 」「 1% of their maximum health every 1.083 seconds 」 as magic damage. Abilities used on an ablazed target are empowered and apply other stacks of Blaze while also refreshing the duration of the previous ones. A target can have up to 3 Blaze stacks at the same time. The damage per tick against monsters is increased by 20%, but capped at 80.
Killing an enemy that is ablazed restores  20 − 40 (based on level) mana.

After reaching 3 stacks on  large monsters or enemy  champions, an area is marked around the target which grants  sight in its radius and explodes after 2 seconds, consuming all the stacks. All enemies struck are dealt 12% − 16% (based on level)「 (+ 1.5% per 100 AP) 」「 (+ 1% per 66 AP) 」 of their maximum health as magic damage and have a stack of Blaze applied to them. The explosion will still trigger if the target dies to the ability reaching 3 stacks or during the delay.
Brand cannot stack Blaze more than once on enemies who have exploded in the past 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Sear
abilities.description: Active: Brand launches a fireball in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy it hits.
descriptions: Active: Brand launches a fireball in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy it hits.
Blaze: The target is also  stunned for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Pillar of Flame
abilities.description: Active: After a 0.625-second delay, Brand erupts the target area in flames, dealing magic damage to enemies within.
descriptions: Active: After a 0.625-second delay, Brand erupts the target area in flames, dealing magic damage to enemies within.
Blaze: Pillar of Flame deals 25% bonus damage.

abilities.name: Conflagration
abilities.description: Active: Brand sets the target enemy aflame, dealing magic damage.
descriptions: Active: Brand sets the target enemy aflame, dealing magic damage.
Blaze: Conflagration also spreads to all enemies around the target.
Conflagration spreads to enemies regardless of having  sight of them or not.

abilities.name: Pyroclasm
abilities.description: Active: Brand launches a fireball at the target enemy that bounces between nearby enemies up to four times, dealing magic damage each time.
abilities.leveling: Magic Damage:»100 / 200 / 300 (+ 25% AP)«Total Single-Target Damage:300 / 600 / 900 (+ 75% AP)
levelings: Magic Damage:»100 / 200 / 300 (+ 25% AP)«Total Single-Target Damage:300 / 600 / 900 (+ 75% AP)
descriptions: Active: Brand launches a fireball at the target enemy that bounces between nearby enemies up to four times, dealing magic damage each time.
If Pyroclasm's current target becomes invalid, it selects a new enemy at its remaining bounces. If there are no nearby valid enemies, the fireball fizzles.
Pyroclasm prioritizes getting 3  Blaze stacks on an enemy, with enemy champions having the highest priority.
The fireball bounces to targets regardless of having  sight of them or not.
Blaze: Pyroclasm  slows enemies hit for 0.25 seconds. This can affect the same target more than once.

name: Brand
title: the Burning Vengeance
blurb: Once a tribesman of the icy Freljord named Kegan Rodhe, the creature known as Brand is a lesson in the temptation of greater power. Seeking one of the legendary World Runes, Kegan betrayed his companions and seized it for himself—and, in an instant, the...
